mapper.select: SELECT `id` , `name` , `pwd` , `mobile` , `realname` , `addtime` , `loginip` , `status` , `statusval` , `isdelete` , `uuid` , `role_id` , `role_name` , `prison_id` , `u_picture` , `enterprise_id` , `nickname` , `remark` , `source` , `sourceval` , `sys_type_id` , `sys_type_name` FROM cr_enterprise_userinfo WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{data.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT `id` , `name` , `pwd` , `mobile` , `realname` , `addtime` , `loginip` , `status` , `statusval` , `isdelete` , `uuid` , `role_id` , `role_name` , `prison_id` , `u_picture` , `enterprise_id` , `nickname` , `remark` , `source` , `sourceval` , `sys_type_id` , `sys_type_name` FROM cr_enterprise_userinfo WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{data.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount FROM cr_enterprise_userinfo WHERE 1 = 1
